definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The day of the national strike tyres were set ablaze in protest.
sentences.chinese: 天的國家罷工輪帶是固定的著火在抗議中。

sentences.english: She stumbled against the fireguard and her nightdress caught fire.
sentences.chinese: 她在爐欄邊被摔了一下，睡衣著火了。

sentences.english: The fiery heart of Sorrow's Furnace is home to some of Tyria's most fearsome creatures.
sentences.chinese: 在悲哀熔爐著火的心臟地區，住著許多可怕的生物。

definition: to discharge smoke/to fume with rage
fire and candles/household things that burn
a burn (tissue damage from heat, chemicals etc)/to burn (the skin etc)/(fig.) (of anger, jealousy etc) to hurt (sb)
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)
